rules_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, cache it instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves. [i](Exile it and create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
notes:
art5
3-drop?

was
Whenever an instant or sorcery spell you control resolves, exile it from your graveyard.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have this creature lose all abilities and become a Subroutine enchantment with “Whenever this Subroutine runs, copy each card exiled with it. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.” (Insert it into one of your programs.)
